name: DataSciColumbia
text:
Announcing #DataScienceDay2022's Industry Keynote Speaker >> Sriram Raghavan! @sriramragh is VP at @IBM Research for AI. He leads a worldwide team of 600+ research scientists & engineers to advance the field of #AI. Learn more & register today https://t.co/koUESHvgsj
#datascience https://t.co/BYyJ5CTcXG
